title: Under Armour Golf Shoes: The Wait Is Over. The Drive Is On.
description:
Under Armour Golf has heard you, and after two years of design input and testing from our athletes like Jordan Spieth, we bring you the Under Armour Golf Footwear Collection.  

We pushed ourselves to create shoes that make athletes better through performance-enhancing details like Charged Cushioning, breathable and water-resistant uppers, aggressive-yet-comfortable traction on the sole, and a structured heel for greater stability.

asset.title: Under Armour Golf Shoes: The Wait Is Over. The Drive Is On.
asset.description:
Under Armour Golf has heard you, and after two years of design input and testing from our athletes like Jordan Spieth, we bring you the Under Armour Golf Footwear Collection.  

We pushed ourselves to create shoes that make athletes better through performance-enhancing details like Charged Cushioning, breathable and water-resistant uppers, aggressive-yet-comfortable traction on the sole, and a structured heel for greater stability.

For more info: http://undrarmr.co/1Zi7kVb
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: It's a constant thought process, aim small, miss small. I hit the shot a thousand times, somethings off, that's been a tough adjustment. The outside noise and the higher pressure situations comes down to so many tiny details. To self belief, aim small, miss small.
